title: FS: Detroit Tigers Ballpark PCs (Mostly Navin Field)
author: calvindog

posts.post_title: FS: Detroit Tigers Ballpark PCs (Mostly Navin Field)
posts.post_content:
PM or email if interested. The second PC is an error card: it actually depicts Cleveland's League Park.  Here is another PC which is labeled correctly with the same image: [url]https://baseballheritagemuseum.org/portfolio/league-park/[/url]

$100
